actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 to provide a mandatory penalty of life imprisonment for any person attempting to assassinate certain Federal officials and other individuals.

summary.text: Provides a mandatory life sentence for any person attempting to assassinate the President or President-elect, Vice-President, Vice-President-elect or the officer next in order of succession to the Presidency, any Members of Congress or Members of Congress-elect or any announced candidate for the office of President.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 to provide a mandatory penalty of life imprisonment for any person attempting to assassinate certain Federal officials and other individuals.
